name: Pandemonium Pinball
description:
Controls

W/Up - Activate flippers, advance dialogue
A/Left and D/Right - Tilt machine
S/Down - Pull back plungers
M - Toggle music

Assets Used

Sound effects by adcbicycle, domrodrig, yottasounds, dorian.mastin, jomse, Ashe Kirk, alexmol, Creature SH, baryy, blevesque4, AntumDeluge, pbimal, benfree, jeicob22, and qubodup at freesound.org.
Benboncan's Boxing Bell 1 with modification, a sound licensed under CC BY 3.0.
Leap by nene and Concrete Jungle by EZduzziteh licensed under OGA-BY 3.0.
BLÅHAJ by IKEA.

Everything Else

This game is open source. You can find the code here.
